ca.mcgill.ecse321.scorekeeper.model

Class Goalie

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse321.scorekeeper.model.Player
      • ca.mcgill.ecse321.scorekeeper.model.Goalie

  • public class Goalie
extends Player
    Domain object that stores data relating to Goalies (extends Player). Players shoot on goal but goalies can also save goals (in addition to doing everything else a Player can do). This is reflected in the inheritance structure.
    See Also:
    Player, Team, Shot, Infraction, League
